articles.title: Philippines to probe report of Chinese sewage-dumping at sea - CNN
articles.description: The Philippines' defense minister on Tuesday ordered the military to investigate a report by a United States-based tech firm that hundreds of Chinese vessels were dumping sewage into contested areas of the South China Sea.
